thought.text: Now I need to apply the type aliases to the annotations before using them:

action.old_str:
arg = arguments.get(name, {})
        if not arg.get('type'):
            field = nodes.field()
            field += nodes.field_name('', 'type ' + name)
            field += nodes.field_body('', nodes.paragraph('', annotation))
            node += field
action.new_str:
arg = arguments.get(name, {})
        if not arg.get('type'):
            field = nodes.field()
            field += nodes.field_name('', 'type ' + name)
            field += nodes.field_body('', nodes.paragraph('', apply_type_aliases(annotation, type_aliases)))
            node += field
